title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 720-3.1 - Designation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 720-3.1 - Designation

State Regulations

Electric, gas, steam, water, and telephone schedules
shall be issued in separate series. The schedules in each series shall be
numbered in consecutive order. The schedule number shall have as a prefix
"P.S.C. No.," and as a suffix "Electricity, Gas, Steam, Water or Telephone," as
appropriate. The schedule or schedules to be superseded, if any, shall be
shown. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
§§
720-3.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
